entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Additional read from memory when reading a field in a struct #92093
  • Runtime test output transcripts in the xml result files use excessive escaping rendering them basically unreadable #92092
    9.0.0
  • JSON serialization -- int to string. -- exception #92091
  • DateTimeOffset constructor returning incorrect offset on macOS & Linux #92084
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Update `System.Memory` nuget package with `Span<T>.Sort` extensions #92081
  • CBOR does not handle canonical NaN correctly #92080
  • Audit identifier formatting algorithm in config binding & JSON generators #92079
    9.0.0
  • [Proposal]: Make MemoryStream use an unrolled linked list as the internal buffer #92078
  • `url.scheme` tag is emitted as part of `http.client.request.duration` metric that does not match the OTel spec #92077
  • [API Proposal]: Add constructor to AssemblyLoadContext that's accepting custom path #92074
  • RegistryKey.GetValue does not account for underlying value changes while reading strings/byte arrays #92072
  • [API Proposal]: Add InvalidEnumArgumentException.ThrowIfUndefined #92071
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests crashes on net9.0-linux-Debug-x64-Mono_release-Ubuntu.2204.Amd64.Open #92070
  • Cbor{Reader, Writer} should support RFC 8949 determinism #92068
  • Socket.ConnectAsync(EndPoint, CT) does not pass CT to DNS query, enabling code with many concurrent connections to the same DNS name to reach a state where no further connections get established because all DNS queries time out #92054
    9.0.0
  • CustomMarshaller uses confusion #92049
  • Methods were covariant return types applies does not inherit attributes #92047
  • System.Net.Dns.RunAsync() does not decrement telemetry for canceled requests #92045
    9.0.0
  • DesignerAttribute/EditorAttribute size implications #92043
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line. #92039
  • [API Proposal]: SortedSet inserted or appended indicator #92038
  • Test falilure GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #92036

Closed

  • [wasm] Perf pipeline broken due to the latest BDN update #92066
  • Android NTLM: Empty Credentials now throws PlatformNotSupportedException #91131
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Linq CountBy method #77716
    9.0.0
  • Why Use `If - If` instead of `If - Else If` or `switch-case` #92015
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.HostModel.Tests failing with "No space left on device" #91039
    9.0.0
  • `Process.Start` will `System.ExecutionEngineException:“Exception_WasThrown”` in VS debug. #92046
  • 8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8 run dotnet run will crash #92050
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #88098
    8.0.0
  • NetworkInformation.NetworkAddressChange not implemented on FreeBSD #27928
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 Preview sending email exception #91377
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87552
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'curSize < maxSplitSize' during 'Emit code' #91251
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Instruction cannot be encoded: IF_LS_2B"' during 'Generate code' #68536
    8.0.0
  • Crypto and Networking tests failing on Linux Mariner when running on Mono. #57506
    Future
  • Getting 400 error when I dont pass the object property in .Net 7 API #90653

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SHUTDOWNGUARD to NonGcHeapProfiler::ObjectAllocated #92096
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • Avoid marking property attributes multiple times #92094
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2267753 #92090
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Linq AggregateBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #92089
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92088
    needs-area-label
  • fix ReceiveFrom with dual mode socket #92086
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92085
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Use runsettings.targets to generate runsettings for host tests in local builds #92083
    area-Host
  • Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0] Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92075
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update installation process of nodejs 18.x to move away from the #92069
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Implement support for `InlineArray` in the trimmer #92060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][Android] Refactor invoking native handler in HttpClientHandler #92051
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, os-ios
  • [release/8.0] Remove public provider from rundown session #92048
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Doc fix-ups to InstrumentRule #92035
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix riscv64 build break due to NDirectImportPrecode::Type conflict #92087
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix performance-setup.sh to track change in BDN #92067
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0] Replace newline characters in NoWarn #92062
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #91899
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91967
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91996
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91962
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [wasi] Work around WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #92061
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix si.ibAllocated in FrozenObjectHeapManager #92052
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #92041
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Metrics Feature Switch #92019
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #91956
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES for 8.0 release #91933
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Switch `BundleExtractToSpecificPath` and `BundleAndRun` to using built test assets #92024
    test-enhancement, area-Single-File
  • [release/8.0] Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #92044
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace newline characters in NoWarn #92010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix InPlaceRuntime layering issues #91919
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Only catch the exception thrown by mono_llvm_cpp_throw_e… #92040
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix si.ibAllocated in FrozenObjectHeapManager #92023
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Minimize net diff of binder-gen visibility/identifier-clash fix #91974
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-asmdiffs-checked-release Helix work items #92020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assert about maximum fragment split size #92027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #91715
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete .NET Native left overs #91960
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove code that is only applicable to emitting mscorlib.dll for .NET Framework #92034
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • enable AIA tests on Mariner #90199
    area-System.Security
  • Delete FEATURE_TRACELOGGING #91986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update `Marshal.QueryInterface()` argument modifier #91984
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] dumpwriterelf: increase buffer to fit a RHEL8 arm64 page. #91953
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Skip duplicate --info output if it is known SDK output #92013
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make Options source gen support Validation attributes having constructor with array parameters #91934
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91794
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92033
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92032
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-System.Configuration
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use `isinst` in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move SearchValues scalar loops into IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #91937
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • JIT: [experiment] Add an explicit IR representation for parameter definitions #92026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
